21.ara-name: كتاب السير عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik: That the Prophet (ﷺ) used to like it when he set out upon an affair if he heard: "O directed one, O successful one." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih Gharib

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الطِّيَرَةِ وَالْفَأْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About At-Tiyarah (Bad Omens)
